build.description: Wrapper for Poetry's build command. Builds the service and it's libraries into a single package.

add.description: Wrapper for Poetry's add command. Accepts all arguments that Poetry's add command accepts with the addition of a --local flag for adding local libraries.

serve.description: Local development environment with file watching and auto-reloading using nodemon

install.description: Wrapper for Poetry's install command. Accepts all arguments that Poetry's install command accepts.

update.description: Wrapper for Poetry's update command. Accepts all arguments that Poetry's update command accepts.

remove.description: Wrapper for Poetry's remove command. Accepts all arguments that Poetry's remove command accepts with the addition of a --local flag for removing local libraries.

lock.description: Wrapper for Poetry's lock command. Accepts all arguments that Poetry's lock command accepts.

black.description: Wrapper for black formatter. Takes no arguments.

pylint.description: Wrapper for pylint linter. Takes no arguments.

pyright.description: Wrapper for pyright type checker. Takes no arguments.

pytest.description: Wrapper for pytest test runner. Takes no arguments.
